titleStmt.title: An harangue to the King by a minister of the French church in the Savoy, the nineteenth of October, 1681.
titleStmt.author: Lombard, André.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for R. Bentley and M. Magnes ...,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to André Lombard by Wing (2nd ed.) and BLC.
